entry.string: TimeZone is a Xaraya Utility Module.
entry.translation: TeemeZune-a is a Xereya Uteelity Mudoole-a.

entry.string: It is currently responsible for handling all timezone related issue.
entry.translation: It is coorrently respunseeble-a fur hundleeng ell teemezune-a releted issooe-a.

entry.string: Automatically showing the user's correct time.
entry.translation: Ootumeteecelly shooeeng zee user's currect teeme-a.

entry.string: Automatically applying Daylight Savings Time modifications.
entry.translation: Ootumeteecelly epplyeeng Deyleeght Sefeengs Teeme-a mudeefficeshuns.

entry.string: Automatically showing time for multiple timezones.
entry.translation: Ootumeteecelly shooeeng teeme-a fur moolteeple-a teemezunes. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Allowing the selection of timezones for user preferences.
entry.translation: Ellooeeng zee selecshun ooff teemezunes fur user prefferences.
